Female: Pruritis; vulva red; dryness and burning in vagina
Burning pain in vagina during coition
Extremities: Pain in all articulation of hands

details: Has been used for milk-flow in nursing women, lumbago and rheumatism, colic, with drowsiness and spasmodic yawning. Is an anti-phlogistic remedy akin to Acon. its symptoms showing congestion and inflammation. Acidity and burning in oesophagus with eructation.
name: Spiranthes
